descriptionSet.description: On this lobby card for the 1968 released Hindi film "Anokhi Raat" directed by Asit Sen, we see a still from the movie showing some of the leading actors in a shop or exhibition hall with several statues.

description-en: On this lobby card for the 1968 released Hindi film "Anokhi Raat" directed by Asit Sen, we see a still from the movie showing some of the leading actors in a shop or exhibition hall with several statues. (gs)
explanatory comments/crosstagging: /data/easydb/import/exc asia and europe/priya paul/neuimport_07august/1727.tif

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Story Line of the movie: In order to save her grandfather's mansion, Rama agrees to marry a much older male, Madanlal, who decides to sell some artifacts to prospective wealthy buyers, including Mr. and Mrs. Rai. The sale is hampered by heavy rains and the entry of a traveling painter-singer, Awara, as well as four bandits, including Baldev Singh, who is wanted by the police for the brutal murder of his wife. Copied from http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0147843/, 2012-08-13. (gs)
related hyperlinks: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0147843/, story line, leading actors, director, last accessed 2012-08-13. (gs)
